test.query_clob:
with thecols as (select table_name, listagg(column_name, ', ' on overflow truncate) within group (order by column_name) col_list
                    from v_user_tab_cols
                    where data_type in ('LONG','CHAR','VARCHAR')
								    and table_name not like '%MV%'
                    group by table_name)
select 'N' pass_yn,
       ao.object_name table_name, 
       ao.object_id unqid,
       apex_string.format('The following columns in table `%0` are using Long, varchar or char : `%1`', 
        p0 => ao.object_name,
        p1 => substr(thecols.col_list,1,50)) code, 
       ao.object_id,
       ao.owner schema
from v_user_objects ao
inner join thecols on thecols.table_name = ao.object_name
where ao.object_type = 'TABLE'
